channel.title: Travel Stories on Yi Yao Tan
channel.description: Recent content in Travel Stories on Yi Yao Tan

item.title: 2 Days in Riyadh Airport
item.description: Part 1: This was unexpected. An airline that forgot to assign a crew, a 57 Euro ticket from Rome to Riyadh, and 2 hours with immigration officers scrolling tiktok later, I got stranded in Riyadh for 2 days. Land of car memes and also the craziest and most fascinating people I’ve ever met. We arrived near midnight. Perhaps more than a hundred people from our flight missed their connecting flight. The airport was still under construction.
